engine_link()
      Module for sending data from one Thumby Color to another
Attributes:
      connected() [returns: True or False]
      start() [returns: None]
      stop() [returns: None]
      set_connected_cb(connected_cb) [returns: None]
      set_disconnected_cb(disconnected_cb) [returns: None]
      send(send_buffer, count, offset) [returns: numbers of bytes sent (int)]
      read(count) [returns: None if no bytes to read otherwise `bytearray`]
      read_into(read_buffer, count, offset) [returns: Number of bytes read into `buffer` (int)]
      available() [returns: Number of bytes available to read (int)]
      clear_send() [returns: mp_const_none]
      clear_read() [returns: mp_const_none]
      is_host() [returns: True or False]

file: src/link/engine_link_module.c
